urls.title: cookie
urls.description: Changes are not allowed (flight, date, time, destination). If you missed your flight (No show) and failed to notify it, your ticket will be cancelled (additional complements plus included taxes). For any flight segments subsequent to an unused segment, you must contact our Call Center within 24 hours after the first flight in order to use the remaining segments. Changes on the day of the flight are not allowed. Non-refundable Cannot be combined with other Fare Families Choose your seat for an additional

urls.title: cookie
urls.description: Our new aircraft model has the most advanced technology to bring you the best flying experience. Discover the modern and sophisticated interior of the 737 MAX. We use our own cookies and third party cookies to both improve your experience on our webpage. If you choose to continue, we will consider that an acceptance of cookie usage. To configure cookies, or to get more information about our Cookies Policy Please Click here We use our own cookies and third party cookies to both improve your experience on

data.text: We went all the way to @Boeing Delivery Center in Seattle to pick up our newest 737 MAX. Since we began our fleet renovation, we’ve received almost 50 of these cutting-edge aircraft, helping us become much greener along the way🌱. Learn about them here: https://t.co/22XzPd9XIF https://t.co/x1VqhICdE3
